longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days:
 - for holders of normal passports issued to nationals of
   Chile; (SEE NOTE 51885) 
     NOTE 51885: The max. stay is granted within 180 days.
Visa required, except for Holders of an APEC Business Travel
Card (ABTC) endorsed  Valid for travel to RUS : 
 - traveling on business. 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold documents required for their
  next destination. (SEE NOTE 43399)
    NOTE 43399: Exempt are holders of a valid visa. 
- Visitors are strongly recommended to hold a health/travel
  insurance to cover for any medical expenses. 
Warning:
- Passport number and nationality must match those stated on
  the APEC Business Travel Card (ABTC).
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry. (SEE NOTE 43399)
    NOTE 43399: Exempt are holders of a valid visa. 



 Russian Fed
